Articles.Content:
Hi. Even in earlier versions, i never did scan contractss where you have to fly to specific areas.

Now with 1.0, i tried my first VIP-Mission. Bring a Tourist to a specific destination. I have the bought the first tracking station upgrade. There, i can see all the destinations for active or possible contracts. But now i am in my plane and i see nothing on my map. How do i see where to go?? i am a bit lost. Do i need the full upgraded tracking center to see that in flight?

Edit: Just saw that i activated the wrong contract. I have to do a suborbital flight. I can't find a delete option here so just an edit.

Edited April 28, 2015 by Melcom
Waypoint manager used to be helpfull for this problem. Hopfully these mods will be compatible soon.
